abstract: The last time Oracle made an unsolicited bid for a company, the chief executive of the target firm, PeopleSoft, compared Lawrence J. Ellison to Genghis Khan and called his team a bunch of sociopaths.
lead_paragraph: The last time Oracle made an unsolicited bid for a company, the chief executive of the target firm, PeopleSoft, compared Lawrence J. Ellison to Genghis Khan and called his team a bunch of sociopaths.

headline.main: BEA’s Oracle Response Is Business, Not Personal
